entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or a few thunderstorms changing to rain showers with thunderstorms this evening. Local rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
